questions.text: What brings you to GAP today?
How often do you shop at GAP?

inspiration.preheader: Rediscover your fashion potential with GAP. Let's reignite your style journey together.
inspiration.hero_image_description: A vibrant image of a diverse group of people confidently wearing GAP outfits, showcasing their unique styles.
inspiration.first_paragraph: We've noticed you haven't been as active with us lately. At GAP, we believe in empowering your unique style journey. Let's reconnect and explore how we can help you achieve your fashion aspirations.

first.template: You've already saved {{customer.highest_value_achieved}} with GAP. Imagine what more you can achieve!
first.fallback: You've already achieved great savings with GAP. Imagine what more you can achieve!

second.template: With your current trends, you could save up to {{customer.potential_savings}} on your next purchase.
second.fallback: With your current trends, you could save significantly on your next purchase.

nostalgia.preheader: Relive the moments when GAP made you feel confident and stylish. Let's create more memories together.
nostalgia.hero_image_description: A nostalgic image of a classic GAP storefront with a warm, inviting atmosphere.
nostalgia.first_paragraph: We've shared some great moments together, and we value the trust you've placed in GAP. Let's continue this journey and rediscover the comfort and style you've always loved.

first.template: You've been a valued member of the GAP family for {{customer.relationship_value}} years. Thank you for being part of our story.
first.fallback: You've been a valued member of the GAP family for many years. Thank you for being part of our story.

second.template: Your loyalty has earned you {{customer.lifetime_value}} in rewards. Let's keep building on that!
second.fallback: Your loyalty has earned you significant rewards. Let's keep building on that!

social_proof.preheader: Be part of a vibrant community that loves GAP as much as you do. Let's celebrate style together.
social_proof.hero_image_description: A lively image of a GAP community event, with people enjoying fashion and camaraderie.
social_proof.first_paragraph: We've noticed you haven't been as active with us lately. At GAP, we thrive on community and shared style experiences. Let's reconnect and celebrate fashion together.

first.template: You're ranked {{customer.community_rank}} in our community. Let's climb higher together!
first.fallback: You're a valued member of our community. Let's achieve more together!

second.template: Your engagement score is {{customer.engagement_score}}. Let's boost it with our latest collections!
second.fallback: Your engagement is important to us. Let's boost it with our latest collections!
